thread.title: New GM appointed at Shanghai Marriott Hotel Pudong East
thread.title_full: New GM appointed at Shanghai Marriott Hotel Pudong East

author: Shanghai, July 6, 2015
title: New GM appointed at Shanghai Marriott Hotel Pudong East
text: New GM appointed at Shanghai Marriott Hotel Pudong East Shanghai, July 6, 2015 TYSON Bae has been appointed as the general manager of Shanghai Marriott Hotel Pudong East with immediate effect. Prior to his new appointment, Bae, who comes from South Korea, was the general manager at Shanghai Marriott Hotel Hongqiao. Bae joined Marriott in 2011 and has more than 15 yearsâ€™ of hospitality experience, having worked in various managerial positions in many countries and cities.
